00043 void trimString(string& str)
00044 {
00045     const char* spaces = " \t\r\n";
00046 
00047     string::size_type pos = str.find_last_not_of(spaces);
00048     if(pos != string::npos)
00049         str.erase(pos+1);
00050 
00051     pos = str.find_first_not_of(spaces);
00052     if(pos != 0)
00053         str.erase(0, pos);
00054 }
00055 } // namespace

00060 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00061 {
00062     if(argc < 3)
00063     {
00064         printUsage();
00065         exit(1);
00066     }
00067 
00068     // set default dictionary file
00069     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00070     if(argc > 3)
00071     {
00072         if(argc == 5 && ! strcmp(argv[3], "--dict"))
00073             sysdict = argv[4];
00074         else
00075         {
00076             cerr << "unknown command option " << argv[3] << endl;
00077             printUsage();
00078             exit(1);
00079         }
00080     }
00081 
00082     // create factory
00083     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00084 
00085     // create analyzer and knowledge
00086     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00087     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00088 
00089     // load dictioanry files
00090     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00091     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00092     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00093     {
00094         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00095         exit(1);
00096     }
00097     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00098 
00099     // set knowledge
00100     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00101     {
00102         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00103         exit(1);
00104     }
00105 
00106     // open files
00107     const char* source = argv[1];
00108     const char* dest = argv[2];
00109     assert(source && dest);
00110 
00111     ifstream from(source);
00112     if(! from)
00113     {
00114         cerr << "error in opening file: " << source << endl;
00115         exit(1);
00116     }
00117 
00118     ofstream to(dest);
00119     if(! to)
00120     {
00121         cerr << "error in opening file: " << dest << endl;
00122         exit(1);
00123     }
00124 
00125     // split sentences
00126     string line;
00127     vector<Sentence> sentVec;
00128     while(getline(from, line))
00129     {
00130         sentVec.clear();
00131         analyzer->splitSentence(line.c_str(), sentVec);
00132         for(size_t i=0; i<sentVec.size(); ++i)
00133         {
00134             string str(sentVec[i].getString());
00135             trimString(str);
00136 
00137             if(!str.empty())
00138                 to << str << endl;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     // destroy instances
00143     delete knowledge;
00144     delete analyzer;
00145 
00146     return 0;
00147 }
